title.rendered: Regent College London nominated for EducationInvestor Awards 2017

content.rendered: Regent College London is proud to have been nominated as a finalist in the ‘Higher education provider of the year’ category at the EducationInvestor Awards 2017. The EducationInvestor Awards recognises outstanding contributions and achievements in the business of learning. The awards ceremony will be held on 5th December at London.
